title: India Covaxin: Some Bhopal slum residents thought they were being vaccinated against Covid-19 but were part of clinical trials
content:
1. India Covaxin: Some Bhopal slum residents thought they were being vaccinated against Covid-19 but were part of clinical trials  CNN
  2. The Latest: Brazils signs vaccine deal with Indian company  WRAL.com

localize.title: 印度考瓦辛：一些博帕尔贫民窟居民以为自己正在接种考瓦辛-19疫苗，但却是临床试验的一部分。
印度考瓦辛：一些博帕爾貧民窟居民以爲自己正在接種考瓦辛-19疫苗，但卻是臨牀試驗的一部分。
